news.title: Paul Mescal and Jessie Buckley nominated for Golden Globe Awards for Hamnet
news.summary: This year’s Golden Globe winners will be announced at the 83rd ceremony in Los Angeles on January 11.

news.title: Addison Rae Announces headline IMMA Dublin show for June 2026
news.summary: Tickets go on sale Thursday, December 11, at 10 AM via Ticketmaster.ie.

news.title: Live Report: Nell Mescal brings raw emotion to the Button Factory
news.summary: As part of her biggest headline tour to date, Nell Mescal transfixed the Button Factory with her tender tunes.

news.title: My Bloody Valentine, Dara Ó Briain and Annika Kilkenny among acts announced for Teenage Cancer Trust shows at the Royal Albert Hall
news.summary: Tickets go on sale Friday, December 12

news.title: UK government expands applicant criteria for overseas music fund after KNEECAP grant lawsuit
news.summary: Though KNEECAP's original 2023 application for funding was approved, UK government entities withheld the finding on the claim the band "oppose the United Kingdom itself."

news.title: Live Report: CMAT offers a glorious homecoming to 3Arena
news.summary: The Irish country-pop princess flawlessly wrapped up her 2025 EURO-COUNTRY tour with her first-ever date in 3Arena on Friday, cementing herself as one of Ireland's best live acts.

news.title: Hot Flavours Christmas Special: Delicious gift ideas, Christmas menus, seasonal specials and the food books of the year
news.summary: As Santa hits the gym to make sure he’s in peak condition for Christmas Day and the reindeer are put on extra carrot rations, we bring you a feast of foodie gift ideas!
